extendedInfo.description: Comic Shelf - Track the Comics you own and the Comics you wantOrganise your library, scan Comics directly into your shelves.When you're in a shop, find out if you have a Comic already, keep its Barcode or see it directly via the web.New to version 4.3.1** Mics fixes around bulk operations** More Connectivity checks* Organise your Comics into shelfs  - Online and offline help* Give your Comics:  - Star Ratings  - Release Date  - Series Name and Number (even allows numbers such as 1a or 1.5)  - Actors  - Studio  - Image  - Genre  - Description  - Characters  - Wanted / Owned / Read tags - with icons  - custom sequence number for sorting  - Color the title  - Add more custom fields or hide some main fields* Scan Barcodes  - supports continual scan and add, with adjustable focus interval  - automatically looks up info for scanned Barcodes's  - library mode scanning* Edit your details  - quick update fields in the list/grid view via multi select or the context menu  - shrink unused fields in the edit view  - track who you've loaned your Comics to* Home Screen  - Direct access to your favourite list - set any lsit as a favourite  - Can change your startup screen* Multiple views  - sort your shelves by title, series, author, date released and rating, sequence - per shelf  - view just Comics that are wanted, not owned or not read or any other tag  - view images in your list  - view Comics in a list or grid format - per shelf  - changable icons on the screens* Lookup information   - supports standard and in-depth searches, region order can be changed in settings  - control what level of internet connection is required for various searches  - both us and uk sources   - Lookup up all info on a shelf in one go  - Download missing images on a shelf in one go* View/Buy a Comic via the internet  - search by actor, title or Barcode  - Scan a Barcode and then view directly on the internet  - type a Comic title and search on the internet* Export and Import Shelves  - multiple export and import formats: csv, xml and txt (tab separated)  - export various fields from just Barcode to all fields (including custom fields)  - export directly to email  - files saved to/read from SD card for easy access  - import prevents duplicates (via Barcode), or allows them  - map file fields to your fields during import  - save anywhere requires a file system app such as 'File Manager' or 'Astro'* Search your Comics for any text field  - control which fields can be searched in settings  - fully integrated with quick search (will need enabling in global search options)* Share Comic details with other applications  - directly to clipboard  - export to our database* Store an image for your book  - take a photo  - select an image from the web  - type a url for the image  * Many maintenance options, in the menus and in the settings  - set default values for common main fields  - add, rename, move, delete shelves and Comics* Customize the fields   - add other fields that you want  - hide the fields you don't want to see, including most pre-defined fields  - can be renamed or changed to take multiple values  - edit the values for a (lookup) field in one easy place, including delete, merge and rename  - clear a field of all values* Backup and restore  - full back up and restore to the sd card  - automatic backups  - restore settings and data seperately* SD Card Support  - move the application  - store the images on the SD card  - hide the images from the gallery viewerPermissions required:Full Internet - for information lookup (and ads)External Storage - for exports and importsCamera - for scanning BarcodesStart at Boot - for intialising auto backupPlease email all suggestions or queries (and problems) to dionhardy200@googlemail.com

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: If could only add a quantity to listings would make it perfect for me...thanks
reviews.author: Paul Gilpatrick

reviews.title: Failed barcode
reviews.comment: Failed barcode reports don\'t work anymore.
reviews.author: michael versak

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: I have been looking for an inventory prog for my comics for years. Please change the xml export to .xml instead of .txt and update for older comics. Would get 5 stars if those were fixed :)
reviews.author: Daniel James

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Won\'t focus to scan barcides
reviews.author: Brandon Curme

reviews.comment: I like the customization
reviews.author: Aran Wagner

reviews.comment: Not good at all..
reviews.author: Ernie Domschine

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: Some of the comics don\'t register so when I add a large amount of comics, and one won\'t update, I have to go back through and find the one that didn\'t. But my biggest complaint is that with most comics entered, the series and title are switched. Very annoying when trying to skim through quickly to see what you need.
reviews.author: Sarah Rhoads

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: I have 500 comics and counting and sometimes it\'s hard to remember which comics I\'ve purchased and to prevent doubles, I look at my Comic Shelf. Customizable shelf names, pictures of the covers, keeps track if you\'ve read a comic or lent one out. Some oddball, independent comics it doesn\'t recognize, but you can enter the info manually and take a picture of the cover. Again, awesome app and would recommend to the avid comic book collectors!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loved this program, but...
reviews.comment: There are a couple things I would like to see, Multi device support for one \"account\", a price guide, and maybe a program on the computer where you can tinker around with the comics you have and change shelves. Other then that I love this program, and I think it\'s the best one out there.
reviews.author: Todd Gelinas

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Would be nice if you could set it to use the light when scanning barcodes.  Would also be nice if you could either delete or rename the default shelf, renaming just creates a new shelf.  Would also be nice if you could go to Web & update info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Works great 90% of the time... a few small issues with bar code scanner but over all great... took some coaxing but finally got it to save pics to sd card and not phone but I think it was due to me having the GS3 ... now it\'s all good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This thing is one-of-a-kind. Scan the comic, and it usually picks up what it is and adds it to your shelf. It looks like you\'re at the mercy of user-entered data on the lookups, but you can fix the inconsistencies pretty easily. If it doesn\'t know a comic, you can send info to the developer and he\'s very responsive. It also lets you do a Web lookup to get more info. Great use of a barcode scanner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Far by the most useful comic shelf app I\'ve downloaded yet. Although when I scan a comic, it does say already exists at most times even if it\'s the same barcode on a different comic issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Some issues are not read properly by the scanner. (Captain America 600). But it still is a great tool to organize your comics
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not right now
reviews.comment: This app has the potential to be awesome. I scanned new comics and it found them instantly.  I scanned an old comic and it pulled up no information.  I scanned a 10 year old comic and it pulled up wrong info.  I\'m not going to use it now but will come back to try it again after some time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: for new comics make sure you scan the full 2 part barcode
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t recognize most of my collection.
reviews.comment: I collect mostly DC comics. I got this app because the idea behind it was practical. However it\'s implementation is faulty. The scan and add feature misrecognized many of my comics. I\'d scan an issue and it\'ll log an entirely different issue into my collection. Eventually I had to change so many titles that I completely forewent the option altogether. Logging my collection became extremely tedious quickly and I\'ve uninstalled the app. Very unsatisfied.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not really useful at all
reviews.comment: I got excited when I saw this app allowed scanning the upc but it does nothing. It just copies the upc number as the title and doesn\'t fill in any info.  There was obviously no database attached to this and everything had to be entered manually including title, author, even the cover image.  Can\'t recommend.
reviews.author: Cody Bridges

reviews.title: Best app in the world
reviews.comment: This app is awesome so much better with the new features, As already said for new comics you have to scan both barcodes, it can be a little tricky but just keep it scanning and it will eventually scan both. Older comics without barcodes will take longer to do but it\'s worth it in the end.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crap!
reviews.author: Brian Q
